price: Tulipo kufanyeni ni sawa na Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
footnotes: Wala hapana walio tutia katika hilaki hii ila wakosefu walio tupotoa tukaiwacha Njia Iliyo Nyooka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
